name: SlimacSmartLight
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, turn on the fan”
”Alexa, brighten the light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This is a Slimac smart light skill.
This is a smart light with a fan that can turn on/off, change brightness, change color temp, and change the power level of the fan.
The skill must log in your Slimac account, and will use the device information that bound with your Slimac account.
Before using, you need to download Slimac APP and register an account, use the registered account to log in to the skill.
